name: Lightlife (Merpui)
description:
Welcome to the Lightlife!

Explore the dark world as a little robot carrying a plant. Find the secrets by turning on your light.


(You can see what I mean with 'dark world' (or not heh...) )

Your goal is to keep the plant (and yourself) alive. The plant needs to be illuminated to survive, but be careful, light costs energy, and your energy is limited…



Luckily, there are some street lamps as checkpoint to regain your energy.



But take care of your surroundings! This place has some dangerous areas, which can only be seen with light…



Can you make it to the end?
